padContent:
PAD - PHP Application Driver

tag_fields/dyna

PHP
HTML
tag_fields/dyna/dyna1.html		 Result
<table border=1>

  <tr>
    <th> department </th>
    <th> manager </th>
    <th> phone </th>
  </tr>

  &open;departments&close;

    <tr>
      <td> &open;$department&close; </td>
      <td> &open;$manager&close; </td>
      <td> &open;$phone&close; </td>
    </tr>

  &open;/departments&close;

</table>
PHP
HTML
tag_fields/dyna/dyna2.html		 Result
<table border=1>

  &open;departments&close;

    &open;first&close;
      <tr>
        <th> &open;&departments:1:name&close; </th>
        <th> &open;&departments:2:name&close; </th>
        <th> &open;&departments:3:name&close; </th>
      </tr>
    &open;/first&close;

    <tr>
      <td> &open;&departments:1:value&close; </td>
      <td> &open;&departments:2:value&close; </td>
      <td> &open;&departments:3:value&close; </td>
    </tr>

  &open;/departments&close;

</table>
PHP
HTML
tag_fields/dyna/dyna3.html		 Result
<table border=1>

  &open;departments&close;

    &open;first&close;
      <tr>
        &open;fields&close;
          <th>&open;$name&close;</th>
        &open;/fields&close;
      </tr>
    &open;/first&close;

    <tr>
      &open;fields&close;
        <td> &open;$value&close; </td>
      &open;/fields&close;
    </tr>

  &open;/departments&close;

</table>
PHP
HTML
tag_fields/dyna/dyna4.html		 Result
<table border=1>

  &open;departments&close;

    &open;first&close;
      <tr>
        &open;names&close;
          <th> &open;$name&close; </th> 
        &open;/names&close;
      </tr>
    &open;/first&close;
      
    <tr>
      &open;values&close;
        <td> &open;$value&close; </td>
      &open;/values&close;
    </tr>

  &open;/departments&close;

</table>
PHP
HTML
tag_fields/dyna/dyna5.html		 Result
<p><table border=1>

  &open;departments&close;

    &open;first&close;
      <tr>
        &open;fields&close;
          <th>&open;$name&close;</th>
        &open;/fields&close;
      </tr>
    &open;/first&close;

    <tr>
      &open;fields&close;
        <td> &open;$value&close; </td>
      &open;/fields&close;
    </tr>

  &open;/departments&close;

</table><p><table border=1>

  &open;departments&close;

    &open;first 'departments'&close;
      <tr>
        &open;fields 'departments'&close;
          <th>&open;$name&close;</th>
        &open;/fields&close;
      </tr>
    &open;/first&close;

    <tr>
      &open;fields 'departments'&close;
        <td> &open;$value&close; </td>
      &open;/fields&close;
    </tr>

  &open;/departments&close;

</table><p><table border=1>

  &open;departments&close;

    &open;first -1&close;
      <tr>
        &open;fields -2&close;
          <th>&open;$name&close;</th>
        &open;/fields&close;
      </tr>
    &open;/first&close;

    <tr>
      &open;fields -1&close;
        <td> &open;$value&close; </td>
      &open;/fields&close;
    </tr>

  &open;/departments&close;

</table>
padExampleSrcHtml:
<p><table border=1>

  &open;departments&close;

    &open;first&close;
      <tr>
        &open;fields&close;
          <th>&open;$name&close;</th>
        &open;/fields&close;
      </tr>
    &open;/first&close;

    <tr>
      &open;fields&close;
        <td> &open;$value&close; </td>
      &open;/fields&close;
    </tr>

  &open;/departments&close;

</table><p><table border=1>

  &open;departments&close;

    &open;first 'departments'&close;
      <tr>
        &open;fields 'departments'&close;
          <th>&open;$name&close;</th>
        &open;/fields&close;
      </tr>
    &open;/first&close;

    <tr>
      &open;fields 'departments'&close;
        <td> &open;$value&close; </td>
      &open;/fields&close;
    </tr>

  &open;/departments&close;

</table><p><table border=1>

  &open;departments&close;

    &open;first -1&close;
      <tr>
        &open;fields -2&close;
          <th>&open;$name&close;</th>
        &open;/fields&close;
      </tr>
    &open;/first&close;

    <tr>
      &open;fields -1&close;
        <td> &open;$value&close; </td>
      &open;/fields&close;
    </tr>

  &open;/departments&close;

</table>
padOutput:
PAD - PHP Application Driver

tag_fields/dyna

PHP
HTML
tag_fields/dyna/dyna1.html		 Result
<table border=1>

  <tr>
    <th> department </th>
    <th> manager </th>
    <th> phone </th>
  </tr>

  {departments}

    <tr>
      <td> {$department} </td>
      <td> {$manager} </td>
      <td> {$phone} </td>
    </tr>

  {/departments}

</table>
PHP
HTML
tag_fields/dyna/dyna2.html		 Result
<table border=1>

  {departments}

    {first}
      <tr>
        <th> {&departments:1:name} </th>
        <th> {&departments:2:name} </th>
        <th> {&departments:3:name} </th>
      </tr>
    {/first}

    <tr>
      <td> {&departments:1:value} </td>
      <td> {&departments:2:value} </td>
      <td> {&departments:3:value} </td>
    </tr>

  {/departments}

</table>
PHP
HTML
tag_fields/dyna/dyna3.html		 Result
<table border=1>

  {departments}

    {first}
      <tr>
        {fields}
          <th>{$name}</th>
        {/fields}
      </tr>
    {/first}

    <tr>
      {fields}
        <td> {$value} </td>
      {/fields}
    </tr>

  {/departments}

</table>
PHP
HTML
tag_fields/dyna/dyna4.html		 Result
<table border=1>

  {departments}

    {first}
      <tr>
        {names}
          <th> {$name} </th> 
        {/names}
      </tr>
    {/first}
      
    <tr>
      {values}
        <td> {$value} </td>
      {/values}
    </tr>

  {/departments}

</table>
PHP
HTML
tag_fields/dyna/dyna5.html		 Result
<p><table border=1>

  {departments}

    {first}
      <tr>
        {fields}
          <th>{$name}</th>
        {/fields}
      </tr>
    {/first}

    <tr>
      {fields}
        <td> {$value} </td>
      {/fields}
    </tr>

  {/departments}

</table><p><table border=1>

  {departments}

    {first 'departments'}
      <tr>
        {fields 'departments'}
          <th>{$name}</th>
        {/fields}
      </tr>
    {/first}

    <tr>
      {fields 'departments'}
        <td> {$value} </td>
      {/fields}
    </tr>

  {/departments}

</table><p><table border=1>

  {departments}

    {first -1}
      <tr>
        {fields -2}
          <th>{$name}</th>
        {/fields}
      </tr>
    {/first}

    <tr>
      {fields -1}
        <td> {$value} </td>
      {/fields}
    </tr>

  {/departments}

</table>
